pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon Neo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons Season 2 (2017, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_neo)Neo Amazons Driver (Neo)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VII$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance II$(li)Regeneration II$(li)Jump Boost IV$(li)Strength X (with empty hand)
